page.title: 19ATTITUDES 1
page.content:
People were asked what they liked about the area & the replies listed below are a summary of the answers given.These answers also reflect the opinions of the young people in the area.
Plenty of space & green fields. Beautiful countryside. Quiet & peaceful. Good church life. Pretty villages. Attractive well kept gardens. Near to towns & central for the Cotswolds. Good services - school, pub, post office. Marvellous views of the surrounding area. Good horse riding facilities. Few tourists. Easy to get to know people. Few people wished to see any change in the overall character of the area. Replies generally indicate the suitability of the area for retirement.
